title: Iraqi PM Maliki denounces Trump threats to end support if he returns to power
desc: The US president said Iraq would have "zero" chance of success without American support.

title: Key players set to part ways with their PSL franchises
desc: All six previous franchises are only allowed to retain a maximum of four players

title: Pope Leo appoints Bishop Dominic Kimengich assistant Archbishop of Mombasa
desc: The appointment was officially announced on January 28, 2026

title: Mobo Awards 2026: Olivia Dean set to perform
desc: Hip-hop star Eve and comedian Eddie Kadi will host the ceremony being held in Manchester in March.

title: Ecuador condemns ICE agent's attempt to enter Minneapolis consulate
desc: A complaint has been filed by Ecuador, whose consular staff prevented the agent from entering.

title: Ireland now officially free from bird flu
desc: The World Organisation for Animal Health has published Ireland's self-declaration of HPAI-free status

title: Noah Donohoe looked 'startled' after falling off bike
desc: Noah Donohoe looked "startled" in the moments after he fell of his bike on evening he went missing, an inquest into his death has heard.

title: I-League set for new format as clubs propose name change to ‘Indian Football League’
desc: I-League clubs have proposed a new competition format for 2025–26 along with a name change to Indian Football League, pending AIFF Executive Committee approval.

title: Trump ally worried about ‘psychological state’ of ‘dangerous’ president
desc: Robert Fico, Slovakia’s prime minister, said to have expressed fears US president ‘out of his mind’ after Mar-a-Lago visit

title: Mini-stomach organoids grown to improve disease research
desc: Explore the groundbreaking study on mini-stomach organoids that replicate human stomach regions for advanced research.
